name: R√©utilisez vos vid√©os YouTube sur les r√©seaux sociaux avec Gemini AI et ContentDrips
description:
## √Ä propos de ce flux de travail  
Ce flux de travail vous aide √† **r√©utiliser vos vid√©os YouTube sur plusieurs plateformes de r√©seaux sociaux** sans effort manuel. Il est con√ßu pour les cr√©ateurs, les entreprises et les marketeurs qui souhaitent maximiser leur port√©e sans passer des heures √† re-t√©l√©charger du contenu partout.  

---

## Comment √ßa fonctionne  
1. **D√©clencheur depuis YouTube**  
   - Le flux de travail v√©rifie votre cha√Æne YouTube toutes les 10 minutes via le flux RSS.  
   - Il compare l'ID de la derni√®re vid√©o avec le dernier enregistr√© pour d√©tecter si une nouvelle vid√©o a √©t√© t√©l√©charg√©e.  
   - Tutoriel : [Comment obtenir le flux RSS de la cha√Æne YouTube](https://chuck.is/yt-rss/#:~:text=Hit%20CTRL%2BF%20to%20pull,preferred%20RSS%20reader%20and%20rejoice.)  

2. **G√©n√©rer des descriptions avec l'IA**  
   - Utilise **Gemini 2.5 Flash** pour g√©n√©rer automatiquement des descriptions fra√Æches et engageantes pour vos publications.  

3. **Cr√©er des images avec ContentDrips**  
   - ContentDrips propose plusieurs mod√®les (carrousel, image unique, mod√®les de marque, etc.).  
   - Le flux de travail g√©n√®re une image promotionnelle personnalis√©e en utilisant votre description de vid√©o et votre miniature.  
   - Installer le n≈ìud : `npm install n8n-nodes-contentdrips`  
   - Docs : [Tutoriel de blog ContentDrips](https://contentdrips.com/blog/2025/07/automate-content-calendar-with-n8n-and-contentdrips-api/)  

4. **Publier sur les plateformes sociales avec SocialBu**  
   - Au lieu de connecter manuellement chaque API de r√©seau social, ce flux de travail utilise **SocialBu**.  
   - √Ä partir d'une seule connexion, vous pouvez publier sur :  
     Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Twitter (X), LinkedIn, Threads, Pinterest, et plus encore.  
   - Site web : [SocialBu](https://socialbu.com/)  

5. **Recevoir des notifications en temps r√©el via Discord**  
   - Apr√®s chaque ex√©cution, le flux de travail envoie des mises √† jour √† votre canal **Discord**.  
   - Vous saurez si le t√©l√©chargement a r√©ussi ou si une erreur s'est produite (par exemple, limites API).  
   - Guide de configuration : [Identifiants OAuth Discord](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/discord/)  

---

## Pourquoi utiliser ce flux de travail ?  
- Gagnez du temps en **automatisant l'ensemble du processus de r√©utilisation**.  
- Assure un **branding et des visuels coh√©rents** sur les plateformes.  
- Contourne les restrictions des plateformes en tirant parti des **int√©grations de SocialBu**.  
- Vous tient inform√© avec des **notifications Discord**‚Äîpas de devinettes si quelque chose a √©chou√©.  

---

## Exigences  
- Lien du flux RSS de la cha√Æne YouTube  
- Cl√© API ContentDrips, ID de mod√®le et configuration de marque  
- Compte SocialBu avec des plateformes de r√©seaux sociaux connect√©es  
- Identifiants Discord (pour les mises √† jour de webhook)  

---

## Besoin d'aide ?  
Envoyez-moi un message sur LinkedIn : [Shayan Ali Bakhsh](https://www.linkedin.com/in/shayan-khan20/)  

Automatisation heureuse üöÄ

parameters.content:
## üé¨ YouTube Channel Auto-Notification System

### üìã What This Workflow Does:
- **Subscribes** to YouTube channel notifications using PubSubHubbub
- **Receives** real-time notifications when new videos are uploaded
- **Logs** video details automatically to Google Sheets
- **Responds** to YouTube's verification challenges

### üîß Setup Requirements:
1. Replace channel ID in subscription URL
2. Configure webhook endpoint
3. Set up Google Sheets credentials
4. Update verify token if needed

### ‚ö° Auto-Trigger:
Once set up, this workflow automatically runs whenever a new video is published on the monitored YouTube channel!

## üîê Subscription Setup Process

### Step 1: Manual Subscription
- **One-time setup** to register webhook with YouTube
- Sends subscription request to Google's PubSubHubbub service
- Includes callback URL, channel ID, and verification tokens

### üìù Key Parameters:
- **hub.callback**: Your n8n webhook URL
- **hub.topic**: YouTube channel feed URL
- **hub.verify_token**: Security token (lakshit)
- **hub.lease_seconds**: Subscription duration (10 days)

### ‚ö†Ô∏è Important:
- Run this manually once to establish the subscription!
- Schedule to run this every 4 to 5 days to subscribe to channel again, because one subscription last max 10 days

## üéØ Auto-Processing Pipeline

### Verification Flow:
1. **YouTube Challenge** ‚Üí Verify webhook ownership
2. **Token Validation** ‚Üí Confirm security token
3. **Challenge Response** ‚Üí Send back verification code

### Notification Flow:
1. **New Video Alert** ‚Üí Real-time notification received
2. **Data Extraction** ‚Üí Parse video ID and URL
3. **Sheet Update** ‚Üí Log to Google Sheets automatically

### üìä Data Captured:
- Video ID
- YouTube video link
- Status (ready for processing)

# Subscribe to youtube RSS feed using PUBSUBHUBHUB
You can try this method as well, by which youtube will automatically send you the channel latest video, but it did not worked on my new youtube video. It might work on old channels with good followings

# Youtube video trigger
- It will get YouTube channel videos after every 10 minutes and check for latest video

How it works
- Trigger node that will trigger the workflow after every 10 minutes
- RSS feed, to get all videos of a youtube channel.
- Then Check if the video is latest ( We check the latest video ID with the last saved youtube ID )

### How to get youtube Channel RSS link
- Go to that specific youtube channel
- Mouse right click -> select "View Page Source"
- Then search "channel_id" and find something "https://www.youtube.com/feeds/videos.xml?channel_id=UC6ZligwnOYKDjgKFHEPTXzg"

Tutorial Link: [How to get youtube channel RSS Feed Link](https://chuck.is/yt-rss/#:~:text=Hit%20CTRL%2BF%20to%20pull,preferred%20RSS%20reader%20and%20rejoice.)
=Successfully Posted YouTube update on all Platforms

parameters.errorMessage: Could not Upload Image to Social BU after 4 retries

parameters.content:
## Post to all platforms Using SocialBu
We could use n8n custom social media handles but, you have to then manually go to all platforms and get access. Which way too work, also, some platforms will not giuve access if you dont have a proper website and stuff. So its better to use another website

Link to website: [Social Bu](https://socialbu.com/)
Conect and post to: Facebook, Instagram, Youtube, Tiktok. Twitter ( X ), Linkedin, Threads, Pinterest and many more

## Generate Descriptions
We are using Gemini 2.5 Flash to generate content descriptions

## Generate Content Image Using ContentDrips
Why uise content Drips
- It has maannyyy templates for you to get started.
- You can select carousal + many types of images. So its really great to use
- And it has an n8n node, so thanks for that

Here is the node link to install: 
npm install [n8n-nodes-contentdrips](https://www.npmjs.com/package/n8n-nodes-contentdrips)

values.content:
=You are given information about a YouTube video:
- Title: "{{ $json.item.title }}"
- Description: "{{ $json.item.description }}"
- Link: "{{ $json.item.link }}"

Your task:
1. Generate a short description (one sentence, around 10 words, not exceeding 15) that summarizes the video.
2. Generate a short paragraph announcing the new video. It should say "new video is out," briefly explain what it‚Äôs about in a casual tone, and include the YouTube link at the end.

Output format: JSON with two keys:
{
  "short_description": "...",
  "post_text": "..."
}

Examples:

Input:
Title: "Peaceful Mountains and Sea üåä | 10s Relaxing Nature Clip"
Description: "Enjoy a calm 10-second clip of the sea gently meeting the mountains."
Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NupfPpGO3j8

Output:
{
  "short_description": "A peaceful 10-second clip showing calm sea and mountains.",
  "post_text": "A new video is out! üåä This short clip captures the peaceful meeting of mountains and sea, perfect for a quick relaxing break. Watch here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NupfPpGO3j8"
}

---

Input:
Title: "Desert video | 10 seconds"
Description: "A short clip of a moving desert shot taken from Pexels."
Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6lcOzFx_JXI

Output:
{
  "short_description": "A calming short desert clip with stunning golden sandy views.",
  "post_text": "New video is up! üèúÔ∏è Check out this 10-second desert clip that captures the still beauty of endless sands. Watch it now: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6lcOzFx_JXI"
}

Now generate the output in the exact JSON format for the provided video info.

parameters.content:
## Update Content Drips Credentials 
- API Key
- Template ID
- Branding

[Tutorial ( Follow step 1 only)](https://contentdrips.com/blog/2025/07/automate-content-calendar-with-n8n-and-contentdrips-api/)

## Update your Email and Password Here
- Connect your socials platforms first in Social Bu!

## Update your API Credentials for Discord
[Tutorial ( Follow OAuth 2 Step only )](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/discord/)

# About this Workflow

### Repurpose your YouTube Video to multiple Social Medias.

## How it Works
- You upload video to YouTube
- This workflow will fetch your latest Video
- Create An Image using description and Thumbnail
- Upload it to Facebook, Instagram, Youtube, Tiktok. Twitter ( X ), Linkedin, Threads and many more
- Finally notify on Discord about updates. Success update, and if any error occured ( It could be API hit limits etc )

### Need Help?
Message on Linkedin [Shayan Ali Bakhsh](https://www.linkedin.com/in/shayan-khan20/)

Happy Automation!

data.details: In n8n, when a workflow execution fails, it can start another workflow. This second workflow can be any arbitrary workflow on your n8n instance. Use the Error Trigger node as your Trigger in the Error workflow.

generic.label: Creating Error Workflows in n8n

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
